title: Are Trump’s Mar-a-Lago Neighbors Trying To Stop Him From Permanently Moving There?
subtitle: Post-presidential life for Trump is not going to be a walk in the park.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In December 2020, an attorney for the neighbors of U.S. President Donald Trump's private club, Mar-a-Lago, sent a letter to the town of Palm Beach requesting that officials stop him from moving permanently into the club.
